title: 3dAmpToRSFC
description: Convert spectral amplitudes into standard RSFC parameters.

output_alff.title: ALFF Output
output_alff.description: Amplitude of low frequency fluctuations (L1 sum).

output_malff.title: mALFF Output
output_malff.description: ALFF divided by the mean value within the input/estimated whole brain mask (mean-scaled ALFF).

output_falff.title: fALFF Output
output_falff.description: ALFF divided by sum of full amplitude spectrum (fractional ALFF).

output_rsfa.title: RSFA Output
output_rsfa.description: Square-root of summed square of low frequency fluctuations (L2 sum).

output_mrsfa.title: mRSFA Output
output_mrsfa.description: RSFA divided by the mean value within the input/estimated whole brain mask (mean-scaled RSFA).

output_frsfa.title: fRSFA Output
output_frsfa.description: ALFF divided by sum of full amplitude spectrum (fractional RSFA).
